achievements.description: Collaborated with the City of Cambridge as part of a university program to redesign the official city website,with modern UI/UX for 10,000+ monthly visitors.
Restructured site content and navigation for better organization and intuitive user experience.
Optimized with JavaScript, cutting page load times by 25% and enhancing overall site responsiveness.
Collaborated with city stakeholders to ensure design aligns with civic goals and resident needs.
Developed 30+ backend features for an IoT platform with FastAPI and PostgreSQL, including telemetry ingestion, RBAC, real-time WebSocket updates, and predictive air quality modeling.
Created building analytics dashboards with PostgreSQL to detect air-quality anomalies and peak usage trends, improving facility monitoring efficiency by 35%.
Implemented multi-system configuration updates using the Saga pattern with audit logging and rollback, reducing deployment errors across distributed services.
Built an automated DevOps pipeline to extract issue data and uploads to Azure Storage or shared folders.
Developed a full-stack course registration and SA/TA application portal, streamlining workflows for 1,000+ students and faculty.
Designed normalized database schemas and built RESTful APIs for reliable, scalable integration between backend and frontend services.
Automated the SA/TA review process with tracking, notifications, and admin dashboards, reducing processing time by 60% and reducing manual workload for staff.
